channel.title: Personal on Ahmed Alghali Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Ahmed Alghali Blog

item.title: Days That I Don’t Understand
item.author: ahmed@offsechq.com (A.Alghali)
item.description: I had a friend whom I met online, he suffered from social anxiety, he would tell me how he panic from the idea of going to the university, I knew he wasn’t lying but a part of me couldn’t just believe it, that how a psychological disorder can control you this much, you just need to stop overthinking that people will hurt you and there is no reason to be afraid and call it a day! yes, I was ignorant I tried to convince him to change something he can’t, that he can overcome this and these are only voices in his heads.

item.title: Why I’m Sharing Notes
item.author: ahmed@offsechq.com (A.Alghali)
item.description:
do things badly

As the years pass by, I find myself adapting to different reasons to keep living, and to share, I’m not as clear as I used to be about why I should be posting something publicly, but looking back over the years, I recall how writing started. How reasons changed.
